messages.sender: cross talk - a podcast about crosswords - listen on apple podcasts or spotify
messages.message:
Hi all - a few months ago, we tagged a handful of apps as `deprecated` with the plan that they would be removed from the codebase after a few months. The time has come! PLEX will be working through deleting these apps in the next sprint or so, and we are targeting having them all gone by the October release. Please reach out in <#CLBGA5A7K|> with issues or concerns.

The apps are:
• Data Manager
• Encrypted Drive
• Form
• Lens
• Report
• Sequencer
• Table Refiner
• Visual Refiner
• Viz
Two other deprecated-ish apps:
• Metrics (the standalone app is retired in favor of Settings -> Metrics)
• Recipe Book (no longer visitable as an app, but the ability to view custom UIs/recipe book files remains)
You can check out the docs (https://dogfood.instabase.com/docs/reference/apps/deprecated/) or the original JIRA (https://instabase.atlassian.net/browse/CD-96) for more context
cc @Kerry it's happening!!! No more maintaining these :)

@cross talk - a podcast about crosswords - listen on apple podcasts or spotify do we have another Jira for these deprecated app removal actions? (Hint: looking for a Jira with a Fix Version and release notes and doc updates)
